text: Since I was a little girl, I really wanted to become a teacher and especially a teacher in primary school. But at this moment, I didn't really know why I wanted to do this kind of job. But today, I know. Indeed, since I was young, there are children all around me because my mother works with them, she takes care of them. So, I played with children, cried with children and lived with children all of my childhood. But when I grew up, I have also begin to teach them some things like how to say this word, or to speak this language... And I discovered that I really love to teach and help children and that I want to do a work with children. Unfortunately, my dream to become teacher has changed when I was in high school because all my life I had one and only one dream and I hadn't really think about any others jobs. That is why, I decided to change my mind to become a journalist and to choose in high school some subjects like SES or HGGSP that can help me for my future studies.. But, in order to work in summer, I decided to have my BAFA, that is a license that allows to work with children during the holidays. This experience was really amazing for me and allows me to realize that I would like to work with children. Moreover, I already work during the last holidays with children and it was a lot of fun. I took care of children between three and ten years old. I was like their sister and it reminds me when I was young. That is why, today, I decided to study education science in order to become  a teacher in primary school.
